GULPÂ¶

The General Utility Lattice Program (GULP) is a progam which excels in the implementation of lattice dynamics solutions.

GULP is extremely well documented with the GULP manuals <https://nanochemistry.curtin.edu.au/gulp/help/manuals.cfm> GULP example
